titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rowland Hutt, 20. 2. [1946]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1280/33-6); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks a lot for the nice detective story. I was in need of one just when it arrived. I can't write anything about myself, except that, after some months of excellent health, I'm feeling rather lousy these days, though I don't know what is the matter with me & perhaps it's just nerves. Still it worries me as it interferes with my University work.
